io.scanbot.sdk.ocr.intelligence

Class OcrPdfRenderer

  • io.scanbot.sdk.ocr.intelligence.OcrPdfRenderer

  • public class OcrPdfRenderer

    Saves class Document with given class Pages into PDF sandwiched with results of OCR. Perform OCR during this process.

    See Also:
    class Document, class Page
